SEARCH
Module com.example.loginpage
Package com.example.loginpage.controller.browse

Class ControllerForEveryBook

java.lang.Object
com.example.loginpage.controller.browse.ControllerForEveryBook
public class ControllerForEveryBook extends Object
This class represents a controller for displaying information about each book and handling user interaction with individual books in a particular section of the application.

  • Constructor Summary

    ControllerForEveryBook()
    Default constructor that initializes the BookDAO instance.

    • addToFavourite

      public void addToFavourite(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Toggles the favorite status of the current book based on its existing state.
      Parameters:

    • handleBookClicked

      public static void handleBookClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, javafx.scene.Scene scene1, Book book, User user1)
      Static method to handle mouse click events on books, opening a detailed view for the clicked book.
      Parameters:
      event - MouseEvent that triggered this action.
      scene1 - The current scene where the event is triggered.
      book - The book to display details for.
      user1 - The user currently logged in.
